scripts.android-releasebuild: cd android && gradlew clean && gradlew assembleRelease && echo 'Sucessfully release build' && cd ..
scripts.android-debugbuild: cd android && gradlew clean && gradlew debugRelease && echo 'Sucessfully debug build'  && cd ..
scripts.android-bundlerbuild: cd android && gradlew clean && gradlew bundleRelease && echo 'Sucessfully bundler build' && cd ..
